divs: Sighting Details Sat After Thanksksgiv About 5;30 pm .Thought it was a hellicop in trouble.Spinning out of control. It was coming right for us and then turned to our right .I ran inside and grabbed binocs. Therewas abrite orange globe above it. kind of a beam too . The three orbs moved fasy to thesouth and 5 jet s slowly swooped down onthem. WEthought they were going to hit one .they were as big as the jets and then took offto the SN.We were changingthe brakes on my friends truckand I noticed ared light in the sky.Threegun metal balls with bigred lights ,spinning in a slinky motion .no helicopter.We counted fivbe jets zoomm down on them , one almost hit them or it?Thenit was gone . there was astrange orange globe above that went straight up and dissappered
Summary: multiple orbs w/ large red eyes spinning in a sslinky formtion -jets too 1
